Posts.Content: Thank you, yes the consultant said treatable so we’re trying to focus on that x
Posts.Title: Bombshell day

Posts.Content: Hi there. So today my wife had an emergency appointment at he breast clinic. Mammogram, ultra sound then to see the consultant. After ultra sound she ended up having 2 biopsies. One from the breast and the other from the lymph node on the same side as there was swelling. we were told that it looks like breast cancer, she was sorry to have to give us such bad news but wanted to be honest. my wife, Sally, almost cancelled today as it had gone down a lot but I insisted. So you can imagine what an absolute shock this is to us both. She said it was treatable but now I just want to know what grade it is, what’s going to be done etc etc. they said they would call us Wednesday or Thursday to discuss the findings. She said she will know from the biopsy where we stand and an indicator of what treatment. what an awful horrible time this waiting is. clare x
Posts.Title: Bombshell day

Posts.Content: Aw thank u that’s lovely, will look into those forums you mentioned. Half way now just 2 more days to go x

Posts.Content: Thank you sue. We are going out with the dogs tomorrow and lunch, then Wednesday premier seats for mamma Mia!,yay!
